abstract.t: This document describes GIA, an architecture for a scalableGlobal IP-Anycast service. In contrast to previousapproaches, which route IP-anycast through the unicastrouting system, GIA provides IP-anycast with its ownrouting protocol. To scale, GIA pushes the overhead ofanycast routing to the edge of the network and off-load themiddle routers of the burden of storing anycast routes.
